text:
Is there a way to check if a high-resolution timestamp is contained within a low-resolution one?
```using Dates
t_month = floor(Dates.now(), Dates.Month)
t_sec = floor(Dates.now(), Dates.Second)
t_sec in t_month == true # method error```

t_sec in t_month == true # method error

text: no I don't think so. `Dates.Month` is still a point in time, not a range. Just do `<` and `>`
